data.title: GUARDIAN-CCS HOMEPAGE

worked with charts, infinite scrolling, tables, custom tree views, etc.

data.title: GUARDIAN ADMIN PORTAL
data.description: a system for company's managers to easily organize and modify contents (such as news articles, video materials and certifications) displayed on the main homepage

added image drag & drop feature and items order management
custom components, file uploads, youtube preview etc.

data.title: GUARDIAN Developers

creating reusable custom components and pages
handling file uploads, downloads and online editing

data.title: Virtual Sensor System
